quizzes.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals

quizzes.title: Web Development Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of web development

questions.text: Which of the following is not a JavaScript data type?
questions.explanation: JavaScript has Number type that handles both integers and floating-point values, but there is no separate Float type.

questions.text: What keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript that cannot be reassigned?
questions.explanation: The 'const' keyword is used to declare variables that cannot be reassigned.

questions.text: Which image shows the correct HTML structure?
questions.explanation: Option 2 shows the correct HTML structure with proper nesting of elements.

questions.text: What is the output of console.log(typeof []);
questions.explanation: In JavaScript, arrays are actually objects, so typeof [] returns 'object'.

questions.text: What method is used to add an element to the end of an array in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: The push() method adds one or more elements to the end of an array.

questions.text: Which CSS property is used to change the text color?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property in CSS is used to set the color of text.

questions.text: What HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The <a> (anchor) tag is used to create hyperlinks in HTML.

questions.text: Which image shows a correct flexbox layout?
questions.explanation: Option 1 shows the correct flexbox layout with items properly aligned.

questions.text: Which HTTP status code represents 'Not Found'?
questions.explanation: The 404 status code indicates that the requested resource was not found on the server.

questions.text: What does the acronym DOM stand for in web development?
questions.explanation: The Document Object Model (DOM) is a programming interface for web documents.
